title: Jaylen Brown leads Celtics to victory against defending...
text:
Jaylen Brown scored 25 points to lead the Boston Celtics to a 112-106 win over the reigning NBA champions Toronto Raptors on Friday.

Brown hit a crucial three-pointer in the closing minutes as Boston held on in a thrilling game in which the lead changed 19 times.

Pascal Siakam led the way for the Raptors with 33 points, while Kyle Lowry scored 29.

☝️ for the win column ✅ pic.twitter.com/3aexTHAgvP — Boston Celtics (@celtics) October 26, 2019

LeBron James had 32 points, 10 assists and seven rebounds to lift the Los Angeles Lakers to a 95-86 victory over the visiting Utah Jazz.

Anthony Davis played a fine support act, with 21 points and seven rebounds on his home debut, while Donovan Mitchell scored 24 points for the Jazz.

🎥 Anthony Davis puts up 21 points and 5 blocks in his debut on the Lakers’ home floor. pic.twitter.com/3LcEox5F1Q — Los Angeles Lakers (@Lakers) October 26, 2019

The Chicago Bulls overcame a nine-point half-time deficit to score a 110-102 victory at the Memphis Grizzlies, with Zach LaVine reaping 37 points.

Boston Celtics´ Grant Williams (12) reacts in front of Toronto Raptors´ Marc Gasol (33) after scoring during the second half of their NBA basketball game in Boston on Friday (Michael Dwyer/AP)

Coby White chimed in with 25 points, 21 of them in the second half as the Bulls fought back.

And the New York derby ended with the Brooklyn Nets beating the Knicks 113-109, with Kyrie Irving scoring 26 points, including a three-pointer to take the lead with 22 seconds left.

Elsewhere, the Minnesota Timberwolves thrashed the Charlotte Hornets 121-99 and the Dallas Mavericks won 123-116 at the New Orleans Pelicans.

The Washington Wizards were 97-85 winners at the Oklahoma City Thunder, the Denver Nuggets beat the visiting Phoenix Suns 108-107 in overtime and the Portland Trail Blazers won 122-112 at the Sacramento Kings.
description: Elsewhere, LeBron James´s 32 points helped the Lakers beat Utah.
